short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Claude.ai past the daily limit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of getting stuck with Claude's chat limit? Use Colada to continue your conversations with your own Anthropic API key.

We seamlessly stitch together your conversation and context with a new Claude 3.5 sonnet chat carried out using your Anthropic API key (or if you'd like, using our managed API key). Simply click the Pineapple emoji in the bottom-right corner of your screen, and continue chatting away!

We store all your extended conversations locally on Chrome, and all API requests are made directly from your browser. We even include project knowledge context on Colada-continued conversations. All we ask for is $9.99 per year (with a 7-day free trial).

We're constantly making improvements and building the ultimate extension for Claude power users. No more limits! Use Claude with Colada today!
